bibl.title: Treasure-Trove and Parapherna.
bibl.note: P. Ryl. II, 125 (15th year of Tiberius'reign) deals with the discovery of a small domestic hoard. There is a close resemblance between the inventory of jewels and the ornaments quoted under the parapherna in some marriage contracts.

bibl.title: Le monde grec. Hommages à Claire Préaux

bibl.seg: Le monde grec. Hommages à Claire Préaux (Bruxelles, 1975) pp. 748-759.

P. Ryl. II, 125 (15th year of Tiberius'reign) deals with the discovery of a small domestic hoard. There is a close resemblance between the inventory of jewels and the ornaments quoted under the parapherna in some marriage contracts.
